mapper.select: SELECT b.item_name FROM m_out_assess a, m_fee_item b WHERE a.item_no=b.item_no AND LEFT(a.occ_date,6)=#{_parameter} GROUP BY b.item_name
SELECT an.prj_no, an.prj_name FROM m_assess_norm an WHERE (an.norm_amount > 0 OR an.norm_price > 0) AND an.team_no=#{_parameter} GROUP BY an.prj_no, an.prj_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_out_assess (`draw_no`, `split_no`, `occ_date`, `ass_date`, `team_no`, `store_no`, `center_no`, `prj_no`, `prj_name`, `plan_item`, `mat_no`, `mat_code`, `mat_price`, `mat_amount`, `mat_bala`, `reserve_no`, `draw_src`, `if_access`, `item_no`, `status`, `remark`, `use_addr`, `wbs`) SELECT CONCAT(REPLACE(a.erp_mat_bill, ' ', ''), '|', RTRIM(a.mat_bill_no)) AS draw_no, 1 split_no, a.occ_date, #{endDate} ass_date, a.team_no, '' store_no, b.dept_code center_no, 0 prj_no, '' prj_name, '' plan_item, 0 mat_no, CONCAT('X', a.mat_code) mat_code, a.occ_bala/a.mat_amount mat_price, a.mat_amount, a.occ_bala AS mat_bala, a.reserve_no, 'm.drawSrc.FACT' draw_src, '1' if_access, 0 item_no, '1' status, '' remark, '' use_addr, '' wbs FROM m_erp_mat a LEFT JOIN sys_organization b ON a.team_no=b.id WHERE a.move_type='' AND a.center_no='' AND a.erp_mat_bill LIKE CONCAT(#{month}, '%') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM m_out_assess WHERE draw_no=CONCAT(REPLACE(a.erp_mat_bill, ' ', ''), '|', RTRIM(a.mat_bill_no))) UNION SELECT CONCAT('TGK', a.draw_no) draw_no, 1 split_no, a.out_date, #{endDate} ass_date, a.team_no, a.store_no, c.dept_code center_no, a.prj_no, mp.prj_name, a.item_no plan_item, a.mat_no, b.mat_code, a.mat_price, a.out_amount mat_amount, a.mat_price*a.out_amount mat_bala, a.reserve_no, 'm.drawSrc.TGK' draw_src, '1' if_access, 0 item_no, '1' status, a.apply_info remark, a.use_addr, a.reserve3 FROM m_out a LEFT JOIN m_material b ON a.mat_no=b.mat_no LEFT JOIN m_prj mp ON a.prj_no=mp.prj_no LEFT JOIN sys_organization c ON a.team_no=c.id WHERE a.out_date >= #{beginDate} AND a.out_date <= #{endDate} AND a.data_src='m.dataSrc.3' AND a.draw_step='7202F' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM m_out_assess WHERE draw_no=CONCAT('TGK', a.draw_no)) UNION SELECT CONCAT('TGK', a.draw_no) draw_no, 1 split_no, a.out_date, #{endDate} ass_date, a.team_no, a.store_no, c.dept_code center_no, a.prj_no, mp.prj_name, a.item_no plan_item, a.mat_no, b.mat_code, CASE WHEN b.new_old='X' THEN (a.mat_price * 0.3) ELSE a.price1 END mat_price, a.out_amount mat_amount, (CASE WHEN b.new_old='X' THEN (a.mat_price * 0.3) ELSE a.price1 END)*a.out_amount mat_bala, a.reserve_no, 'm.drawSrc.TGK' draw_src, '1' if_access, 0 item_no, '1' status, a.apply_info remark, a.use_addr, a.reserve3 FROM m_out a LEFT JOIN m_material b ON a.mat_no=b.mat_no LEFT JOIN m_prj mp ON a.prj_no=mp.prj_no LEFT JOIN sys_organization c ON a.team_no=c.id WHERE a.out_date >= #{beginDate} AND a.out_date <= #{endDate} AND a.data_src='m.dataSrc.P' AND a.out_type!='' AND a.draw_step='7202F' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM m_out_assess WHERE draw_no=CONCAT('TGK', a.draw_no))
mapper.update: UPDATE m_out_assess SET if_access='0' WHERE EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM m_store WHERE store_no=m_out_assess.store_no AND mng_team=#{mngTeam}) AND m_out_assess.ass_date LIKE CONCAT(#{month}, '%')
UPDATE m_out_assess b, m_fee_item a SET b.item_no=a.item_no WHERE b.team_no=a.team_no AND a.item_name=#{itemName} AND a.if_use='1' AND b.ass_date LIKE CONCAT(#{month},'%') AND b.store_no='12'

UPDATE m_out_assess b, m_fee_item a SET b.item_no=a.item_no WHERE b.team_no=a.team_no AND a.item_name=#{itemName} AND a.if_use='1' AND b.ass_date LIKE CONCAT(#{month},'%') AND (b.store_no='15' AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM m_material WHERE b.mat_no=mat_no AND mat_code IN ('X10105604', 'X10320805', 'X11176118')))

UPDATE m_out_assess b, m_fee_item a SET b.item_no=a.item_no, prj_no='0', prj_name='' WHERE b.team_no=a.team_no AND a.item_name='支护材料' AND a.if_use='1' AND b.store_no='13' AND b.ass_date LIKE CONCAT(#{_parameter}, '%') AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM m_material WHERE mat_no=b.mat_no AND mat_type='07')

UPDATE m_out_assess b, (SELECT fm.item_no, fm.mat_no, fi.team_no FROM m_fitem_mat fm, m_fee_item fi WHERE fm.item_no=fi.item_no) a SET b.item_no=a.item_no WHERE b.mat_no=a.mat_no AND b.team_no=a.team_no AND b.ass_date LIKE CONCAT(#{_parameter}, '%')

UPDATE m_out_assess b, m_fee_item a SET b.item_no=a.item_no WHERE b.team_no=a.team_no AND a.item_name='通用材料' AND a.if_use='1' AND b.if_access='1' AND b.ass_date LIKE CONCAT(#{_parameter}, '%') AND b.item_no='0'

UPDATE m_out_assess SET prj_no=0, prj_name='' WHERE prj_no NOT IN (SELECT prj_no FROM m_assess_norm WHERE m_out_assess.team_no=team_no AND m_out_assess.item_no=item_no) AND ass_date LIKE CONCAT(#{_parameter}, '%')
mapper.select: SELECT a.team_no id, (SELECT text FROM sys_organization WHERE id=a.team_no) text FROM m_out_assess a WHERE a.occ_date LIKE CONCAT(#{_parameter}, '%') GROUP BY a.team_no
